questions.text:
What is the powerhouse of the cell?
 a) golgi apparatus
 b) mitochondia
 c) lysosome
 d) nucleus

What is OCaml?
 a) golgi apparatus
 b) mitochondia
 c) a functional programming language
 d) nucleus

Who has 58+ years of programming experience?
 a) golgi apparatus
 b) mitochondia
 c) a functional programming language
 d) David Gries

When was the War of 1812?
 a) 1812
 b) 1912
 c) 2012
 d) When David Gries was born

What is the next line of this song: "Too hot (hot damn) _____________"?
 a) Despacito
 b) Call the police and the fireman
 c) 24 karat magic in the air
 d) Stop, drop, and roll
